welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yuncos, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscape. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the hidden gems and delights our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal primarily used for international flights, including many long-haul destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Barajas Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for some long-haul flights and as a hub for Iberia Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code from a local phone number or email address.
